official_title: To designate January 13, 1991, as a national day of prayer for members of American military forces stationed in the Middle East, and for their families.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should designate January 13, 1991, as a national day of prayer for members of American military forces stationed in the Middle East and for their families.
